headline: Alphabet and Tesla Earnings, Home Sales and More: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season rolls on this week, with the first of the Magnificent Seven tech names to report, Tesla and Google parent Alphabet. New economic data will shed more light on how tariffs are affecting consumer and business spending, and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is slated to speak on bank regulation.

headline: Aerin Medical Appoints Lucas Buchanan as Independent Board Director
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., July 22, 2025--Aerin Medical Inc., a leader in minimally invasive solutions for chronic nasal conditions, today announced the appointment of Lucas Buchanan to its Board of Directors. Mr. Buchanan will serve as an independent director, bringing important expertise and strategic perspective to guide Aerin’s significant value creation.

headline: What To Expect From Boston Scientific’s (BSX) Q2 Earnings
summary: Medical device company Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) will be reporting earnings this Wednesday before market hours. Here’s what you need to know.
